data.title: TAINIOMANIA
data.meta_description:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Nigel Cole (born 1959) is a British film and television director.

Cole began his career in the 1980s, directing current affairs shows and documentaries for Central Independent Television. Into the 1990s, Cole co-wrote the play Sod with Arthur Smith, which he also directed and presented at the Pleasance during the 1993 Edinburgh Festival. Cole has also direct...
